LPARs moves from LDC to CDC/PTT -- Technical Steps

Pre-cutover tasks

  1. Agree the list of lpars and get approval for down time - Jeff / PM
  2. Define LPARs at PTT - CSI
    1. Email the WWNs to PTT Team for zoning and Storage team for host definitions.
  3. Perform zoning at PTT - PTT
  4. Perform host definitions at PTT Pure
  5. Create schedule for each day and time - CSI
  6. Make sure hosts in scope has their data replicated. - CSI
  7. Capture the state and disable NFS and create alt disk copy

Cut over plan

  1. Enable blackout for servers
  2. Shutdown applications on the Server list – Check the worksheet.
  3. Shutdown databases (if any ) on the Server list – Check the worksheet.
  4. Shutdown servers
  5. Perform an adhoc replication, and provision storage at CDC/PTT
  6. Start LPARs at CDC/PTT
  7. Start databases on PTT LPARs
  8. Start applications on PTT LPARs – Remember licenses.
  9. Email monitoring team that the systems have been moved.
  10. Email Backup team ( Andy Hill, James Fort )
  11. Rename the LPARs on tgprhmc6(LDC) to ”-migrated-to-CDC-PTT”

Functional tests

  1. Validate the cloned applications work as expected.

Backout plan

  1. Shutdown applications on PTT lpars.
  2. Shutdown databases on PTT lpars.
  3. Shutdown servers PTT
  4. Boot LPARs at LDC.

Cleanup / Post move tasks

  1. Cleanup LPARs and storage at LDC.
  2. For cloned systems,
    1. Stop LDC → DRIVE replication
    2. Start CDC/PTT → DRIVE replication
